content.query:
-- 1. switch to use woca_ldw
USE woca_ldw
GO 

--1a. count the cities where families hail
SELECT 
    city,
    COUNT(city) AS totals
FROM silver.Family
WHERE city IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY city
ORDER BY totals DESC;


--2a. count the cities where families hail
-- replace families come from a particular city
-- it might be better to do this in python
SELECT
    REPLACE(city, '[,]', '') AS cities,
    COUNT(city) AS totals
FROM silver.Family
WHERE city IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY city
ORDER BY totals DESC;

--3a. top 10 cities where families hail
SELECT TOP 10
    REPLACE(city, '[,]', '') AS cities,
    COUNT(city) AS totals
FROM silver.Family
WHERE city IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY city
ORDER BY totals DESC;
